channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wall Street will be ruled by ‘rumor and pseudo-drama’ if government shutdown goes ahead, warns UBS
item.description: Wall Street braces for a U.S. government shutdown as payroll data stalls, leaving the Fed and investors flying blind on key economic signals.

item.title: You Can Always Do More as a Business Owner, but Should You?
item.description: The best leaders understand that they have to deliver both consistency and intensity in varying degrees on a regular basis.

item.title: Science Says You Can Tell in 5 Minutes if Someone Isn’t Nearly as Smart as They Think: the ‘Cynical Genius Illusion’

item.title: Does Owning a Business Push People to the Political Right? A Stanford Study Says Yes
